title: jmri-json-oblock-client-message
description: Schema data object in message from client to JMRI for type "oblock"

userName.description: If present, set the user name of the oblock

comment.description: If present, set the comment for the oblock

value.description: If present, sets the value of the oblock

speed.description: The authorized speed through the oblock; authorized values depend on signal system in use

curvature.description: Curvature of oblock; allowed values correspond to NONE, GRADUAL, TIGHT, SEVERE in that order

direction.description: Direction of oblock; see http://jmri.org/JavaDoc/doc/jmri/Path.html for possible values

permissive.description: true if oblock allows a train to enter it while occupied; false otherwise

speedLimit.description: The maximum allowed speed for the oblock

denied.description: List of names of oblocks that trains cannot enter this oblock from

items.description: Name of a oblock that trains cannot enter this oblock from
